ratings.en: Yûko no mezame!! Katei no jijô de kyô kara mazoku
Supokon desu ka!? Bambutsu wa ruten suru
Akumu ka kichimu ka!? Yami no doasutoppâ-san kôrin
Kokoro togisumase!! Mahô shôjo no arata naru chikara
Chônai wa wana darake?? Gakeppuchi mazoku no arata naru nôryoku
Asu e no ketsui!! Omoi kondara tomaranai
Momoiro mesoddo!! Marui taiya wa unmei no wa!!
Norowareta kajitsu!! Suppai Mikan ni goyôjin!!
Kimatsu tesuto!! Kyô no watashi wa zunôha mazoku!!
Gosenzo wa shinka suru!! Megane ga utsusu ankoku bushitsu
Yume dorîmu futatabi!! Momoiro bôeisen o toppa seyo
Tsutaetai omoi!! Mazoku arata naru ippo!!
Taiketsu futatabi! Mahô shôjo no arata naru sugata!?
Haikyo sôsaku! Wakeari Mikan to wakuwaku mazoku
Yami no majo futatabi! Yukemuri furomu heru!
Shinshu hakken! Machi no kissa wa mazoku no sôkutsu
Kachikome! Momoiro no Shamiko dakkan sakusen!
Hitotoki no kyûka!! Mazoku no natsumatsuri
Yûhi no chikai! Mazoku tachi no susumu michi
Hibana chiru!? Hikari to yami no gôdô ensoku
Kuroki kanjô!! Dâkunesu pîchi futatabi!!
Gosenzo dôjô!? Mazoku kyûkyoku no buki!
Shin gakki! Mahô shôjo no aratanaru yakuwari!
Yamiyo no gishiki! Mazoku arata naru nakama!!
